name: A Job Interview
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

This is the fixed version. The one submitted misses 2 levels which were made before the deadline. 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rUWQOFFYxgY25jsxjttUorr6BUMvCS8P/view?usp=shari...

You are facing the biggest obstacle on your path to a beautiful career as a Button Pressing Specialist - a job interview. You have been put through countless tests and evaluations and finally you are allowed to approach the final challenge. The task is simple: Make sure the test robots survive, by pressing correct buttons. Simple, right? Well, you never know when something goes out of control.

Controls:
Left mouse click to smash your fist down. If you manage to hit a button, it will become pressed.

Unfortunately, there is a bug in the submitted file, which doesn't allow to progress after finishing a level. The simplest solution is to restart the game and a new level will be unlocked in the main menu. Couldn't fix it after the deadline, so it has to stay.
